name: Falcon Solution and Services
overview:
Best software-companies-in-dehradun. Two hundred and twenty kilometers away from the capital of India New Delhi, Doon valley lies in the foothills of Himalayas. Here and above in the hills, Indian sages have been coming to ponder over life matters from ancient times till today. The combined classic wisdom they left to the humankind to benefit from still holds true in the age of ever evolving technically advanced communications, systems and life styles. In the same land of the sages – of yoga, meditation and Darshan, we at Falcon Solution and Services mediate and dwell upon IT matters and come up with solutions to meet and match our client’s requirements and expectations. It was a deliberate decision to make our base in DehraDun and avoiding falling the popular but common option of New Delhi. More we tried to look out, more we realized that we needed to be away from the hoi polloi to work in relative peace and exclusivity. Our approach has been to be firmly rooted Locally while looking out Globally in terms of learnings and challenges. Falcon Solution and Services made a formal beginning in 2004 with a Team of Experienced IT Professionals and ex Techno members of Open Source enthusiasts working under the banner of Sir George Everest Research Society. We provide & implement Open Source Solutions on Windows & Linux platforms :-

  • Management Information System
  • Library Management System
  • Information Security
  • RDBMS
  • Customized Solutions
  • Multi Media Presentations
  • Web Hosting & Web based Solutions { Content Management, on line Course Management, Project Management, On Line Surveys, Dynamic FAQ, Customer Relationship, Live Support system, Support Tickets System, Community based portal System, E-commerce Solutions } We are designing & developing software which runs on cross platform like Windows and Linux OS. We are implementing projects based on open source RDBMS on the back end and JAVA on the front end. We have designed & implemented several software projects for various organizations including Private, Government & Semi/Autonomous Government Institutions. We employ the best of talent who work on various software applications for website and multimedia development. Website development tools like Dreamweaver, Flash, Swish, Photoshop and various 3D imaging software applications are used extensively to produce the most authentic design, suited exactly to our customers requirements. Languages and scripts like AJAX, XML, HTML, DHTML, Javascript, Java, CGI, Perl, VBScript, ASP,.Net, PHP, Actionscript and databases like PgSql, MS SQL, MySQL and MS Access are used to develop highly interactive front-end and reliable backend applications for these websites. We take Consultancy & Turnkey Projects.
